meta.title: DataMB | Compare Centrebacks
meta.description: Compare the statistics of defenders (centre-backs) in the Top 7 Leagues. Visualize player performance. Find similar profiles. Use our radar tool to compare duel win rate; aerial duels; interceptions; tackles; possessions won; passes; passing accuracy; progressive passes; progressive runs and more for centre-backs in Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Eredivisie, Primeira Liga.
